name: AIRWORKS AVIATION COMPANY, INC
about: Airworks Aviation Academy, located at the General Aviation Area, Mactan-Cebu International Airport, Lapu-Lapu City, Cebu, Philippines, is the country's top and largest flying school. Duly accredited by the Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines as an Approved Training Organization, the academy offers world-class flight training to local and international students. Founded in 1993, Airworks has grown steadily, providing comprehensive programs including Integrated and Modular Pilot Courses. The school boasts the best facilities, a large fleet of modern aircraft, and experienced, FAA-certified instructors. With a strong focus on safety and industry connections, Airworks ensures its graduates are employed by leading airlines globally. Join us to achieve your dream of becoming a professional airline pilot with one of Asia's leading pilot training academies.
